scripts.install: cd ./host-app && npm i && cd ../remote-app && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd host-app; npm run dev" "cd remote-app; npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd host-app; npm run start" "cd remote-app; npm run start"
scripts.build: cd ./host-app && npm run build && cd ../remote-app && npm run build
